yugioh.name: Blue Eyes White Dragon
yugioh.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

yugioh.name: Dark Magician
yugioh.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

yugioh.name: Kaiser Glider
yugioh.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has the same ATK. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 monster on the field; return that target to the hand.

yugioh.name: Giant Soldier of Stone
yugioh.description: A giant warrior made of stone. A punch from this creature has earth-shaking results.

yugioh.name: Summoned Skull
yugioh.description: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

yugioh.name: Gravekeeper's Cannonholder
yugioh.description: You can Tribute 1 'Gravekeeper's monster, except 'Gravekeeper's Cannonholder'; inflict 700 damage to your opponent.

yugioh.name: Meteo the Matchless
yugioh.description: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card must be Tribute Summoned by offering 3 Beast-Warrior-Type monsters on your side of the field as Tributes. If this card attacks your opponent's Life Points directly and makes them 0, the controller of this card wins the Match.

yugioh.name: Clown Zombie
yugioh.description: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.
